sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: pCAGGS-5
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: pCAGGS-5
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: Chimeric intron in CAG promoter, forward primer
The lac repressor binds to the lac operator to inhibit transcription in E. coli. This inhibition can be relieved by adding lactose or isopropyl-beta-D-thiogalactopyranoside (IPTG).

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: lac operator
lac promoter
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: promoter for the E. coli lac operon
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: lac promoter
